text: Benedicta Boccoli (born in Milan, 11 November 1966) is an Italian actress. She performs mostly on stage.Benedicta Boccoli Il meglio di Benedicta Boccoli She starred also in movies including Gli angeli di Borsellino (2003), Valzer (2007) and Pietralata (2008).http://www.benedictaboccoli.it/stampa.asp Her sister is actress Brigitta Boccoli. She has also two brothersː Barnaby, television producer, and Filippo. == Theatre == * Blithe Spirit of Noël Coward, 1992/1993 - * Cantando Cantando of Maurizio Micheli, 1994/1995 - * Buonanotte Bettina, of Garinei & Giovannini, 1995/1996/1997 - * Can-Can - Musical of Abe Burrows - 1998/1999 - * Orfeo all'Inferno - of Jacques Offenbach - 1999 - as Tersicore * Polvere di stelle, of Marco Mattolini, 2000/2001/2002 * Le Pillole d'Ercole of Maurice Hennequin & Paul Bilhaud, 2002/2003/2004 * Anfitrion, of Plautus, 2004 * Stalker of Rebecca Gillmann, 2004 * Pluto de Aristophanes, director Michele Mirabella - 2004 * Cactus Flower of Pierre Barillet & Jean-Pierre Grédy, director Tonino Pulci - 2004/2005/2006 * Prova a farmi ridere of Alan Aykbourn, director Maurizio Micheli - 2006 * The Tempest of William Shakespeare, 2006 - as Ariel * Sunshine of William Mastrosimone, director Giorgio Albertazzi - 2007/2008 - * The Apartment, of Billy Wilder, director Patrik Rossi Gastaldi - 2009–2010 * Vite private, of Noël Coward - 2012 * Dis-order, of Neil LaBute – 2014 * Incubi d'Amore, of Augusto Fornari, Toni Fornari, Andrea Maia, Vincenzo Sinopoli – 2014 * Crimini del Cuore, of Beth Henley – 2015 * A Room with a View, of E. M. Forster – 2016 * Cactus Flower of Pierre Barillet and Jean- Pierre Gredy - 2016 * Il più brutto week-end della nostra vita of Norm Foster - 2017-2018 * The test of Jordi Vallejo - 2019-2020 * Su con la vita of Maurizio Micheli - 2020 == Film == *Gli angeli di Borsellino, director Rocco Cesareo – 2003 *Valzer, director Salvatore Maira – 2007 *Dolce di latte, director Gianni Leacche – 2008 *Ciao Brother, director Nicola Barnaba – 2016 == Short film == *La confessione, director herself – 2020 == References == == Other websites == * Benedicta Boccoli Web Page Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Milan Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors
title: Benedicta Boccoli
